channel.title: Server Help - (Only Look if You Can Read and Understand Correctly)
channel.description:
Alright here's my problem. I run a server and it laggs at 32 players because my computer is slow.kramerscape.no-ip.org
[i][u][b]It even says:[/b][/u][/i][code][Kernel] Machine is too slow to run this server!!![/code]
I tried to transfer the server to a different computer but it will not host from there. I redid port forwarding and even moved the ethernet/internet cords to different slots.
I run & own black-scape.no-ip.info
and people want less lagg, so I listen to the people.
Please Help?
Sincerely, Bl4ck Ra1nb0w

item.title: Server Help - (Only Look if You Can Read and Understand Correctly)
item.dc:creator: @bl4ck_ra1nb0w bl4ck ra1nb0w
item.description:
@bl4ck_ra1nb0w wrote:

souljah:

Sometimes different computers dont like to be port forward like mine for instant’si done everything and it didnt work done it on my new laptop and port forwarding worked, most the time its just the computer/internet.

I still want to find a way lol…

Read full topic
item.source: Server Help - (Only Look if You Can Read and Understand Correctly)

item.title: Server Help - (Only Look if You Can Read and Understand Correctly)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Sometimes different computers dont like to be port forward like mine for instant’si done everything and it didnt work done it on my new laptop and port forwarding worked, most the time its just the computer/internet.

Read full topic
item.source: Server Help - (Only Look if You Can Read and Understand Correctly)

item.title: Server Help - (Only Look if You Can Read and Understand Correctly)
item.dc:creator: @bl4ck_ra1nb0w bl4ck ra1nb0w
item.description:
@bl4ck_ra1nb0w wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

Do you have JDK on the new computer?

Of course.

[quote=“indiankid, post:6, topic:68998”]… ok is the port open… and is ur compiler set up right…

and there is no need to call people “stupid”… and it say "I tried to transfer the server to a different one " it confusing so don’t go calling people stupid for the something u didnt show clearly…[/quote]

I put “No Offence”

Also, I already changed it to make it clearer.

And it already said
redid port forwarding
So it is forwarded… The compiler is fine…

The problem is this:
I can run the server on the “old” computer and people can connect.
I run the server on the “new” computer and it starts, but people cannot connect.

souljah:

In small terms u need a faster computer.

because my computer is slow. (IT says this, so I already know)
I stated the [Kernel] Thing to prove it is not my internet, but the computer itself.
It also says I tried to use a faster(Different) computer

In SIMPLE terms, How do I let it work on the new computer?

Read full topic
item.source: Server Help - (Only Look if You Can Read and Understand Correctly)

Do you have JDK on the new computer?

item.source: Server Help - (Only Look if You Can Read and Understand Correctly)

item.title: Server Help - (Only Look if You Can Read and Understand Correctly)
item.dc:creator: @bl4ck_ra1nb0w bl4ck ra1nb0w
item.description:
@bl4ck_ra1nb0w wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

Your computer simply can’t handle that much players without lag. Get a new computer if you want to keep the amount of people, or make it so that only like 20 people can play on your server at a time.[/quote][quote=“darkest_mage, post:3, topic:68998”]im having the same problem on my 512MB, 2Ghz dedicated, you dont have enough ram/cpu combo, try limiting your max users to 35 thats about all you can handle, MAX. if you want it to run comfortably make maximum 27-30

Are you guys stupid…(No Offence)

I said I know the problem…

I have a new computer, but i tried to run on it and it doesn’t work.
That is the Help I need =/.
How to switch it to run on the new one, not the old one.

Read full topic
item.source: Server Help - (Only Look if You Can Read and Understand Correctly)

item.title: Server Help - (Only Look if You Can Read and Understand Correctly)
item.dc:creator: @darkest_mage darkest_mage
item.description:
@darkest_mage wrote:

im having the same problem on my 512MB, 2Ghz dedicated, you dont have enough ram/cpu combo, try limiting your max users to 35 thats about all you can handle, MAX. if you want it to run comfortably make maximum 27-30

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help - (Only Look if You Can Read and Understand Correctly)
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Your computer simply can’t handle that much players without lag. Get a new computer if you want to keep the amount of people, or make it so that only like 20 people can play on your server at a time.

Read full topic
